name: Clash on the Moon RTS
description:
Clash on the Moon RTS is a captivating game, mixing real time strategic game and MMO.
Conquer the Moon, to collect a new mineral named zugerium.
Upgrade your base to defend yourself

Features:
• Defend your empire in real time.
• Increase your base.
• Unprecedented fighting, with more than 2000 units!!
• 7 differents units.
• 6 differents buildings.

More buildings will be available soon
• Airport
• Turrets
• Shield
